definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
lit. every tree or bush an enemy soldier (idiom); fig. to panic and treat everyone as an enemy/to feel beleaguered
Man has but one life, grass but one spring (idiom). fig. the brevity of human existence
pinyin: ren2 sheng1 yi1 shi4 , cao3 mu4 yi1 chun1

sentences.english: Her Life Line is a green ocean-plant, forest.
sentences.chinese: 她的生命线是绿色的海洋草木，森林。

sentences.english: Indeed this already seems to be happening.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，投资者似乎已经开始草木皆兵了。

sentences.english: The Brasilia Plateau in November is verdant in comfortable climate.
sentences.chinese: 11月的巴西利亚高原，草木葱茏，气候宜人。

sentences.english: The effect of plant ash on decreasing the content of heavy metals in plants were not obvious.
sentences.chinese: 草木灰对降低作物体内重金属含量的效果不明显。

sentences.english: Some parts of the country are almost bare of vegetation.
sentences.chinese: 该国有些地方几乎是草木不生。

sentences.english: Whenever the grass was dry the children would cut across me fields instead of keeping to the road.
sentences.chinese: 每当草木枯干时，孩子们宁走荒野也不去走大路。

sentences.english: Vegetation and dry in summer, Mikawa must not flow.
sentences.chinese: 草木夏枯，三川绝而不流。

sentences.english: The flower of surface vegetation, the very lovely fan.
sentences.chinese: 水陆草木之花，可爱者甚蕃。

sentences.english: There is much greenery in lands of fog and clouds and shadow.
sentences.chinese: 多云多雾和多荫的地带，草木也葱郁茂盛。

sentences.english: In addition, the glaze belongs to calcium glaze in which plant ash was added.
sentences.chinese: 另外，白瓷釉可能是加有草木灰的钙釉。

sentences.english: Plant ash can be used to fertilize the soil.
Autumn wind blows cold weather, the plants exposed to shake off the frost.
sentences.chinese: 秋风萧瑟天气凉，草木摇落露为霜。

sentences.english: To investigate the anti-inflammatory mechanism of n-butanol extract from Melilotus suaveolens Ledeb(MSL) in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究草木犀正丁醇提取物在体外的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: Man has but one life, grass sees but one spring.

sentences.english: This plant grows easily on the rockery.
sentences.chinese: 这样的假山上面草木很容易生长。

definition: pine and cypress/fig. chaste and undefiled/fig. tomb
verdant/lush green and full of life
